page.description: The .SET_STYLE() method sets the style for the next insertion into the RTF field.

argument.description: The name of a style. Styles have the following names:

page.example: dim obj as P obj = :Customer_Information:rtfmemofield.this obj.rtf.set_style("Style 2") obj.rtf.insert_text("This is RTF text") ? obj.rtf.get_style() = "Style 2"
